ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a destination product is added by a given stage in the fulfilment process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Lump_sum_investment", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Regular_Contribution", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Transfer_cash_re_reg", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Transfer_cash", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Transfer_re_reg" ) && OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Complete"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Finalise fulfilment"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Investment Checks"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Processing Protection"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Awaiting client payment"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Chasing transfer (outside SLA)"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Chasing transfer (within SLA)"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Awaiting provider action")) && ISBLANK( Destination__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.OW_user_type__c, "Integration"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A destination product is required as you are progressing beyond the submit forms status.
